Package org.apache.sling.commons.osgi

Class BSNRenamer

java.lang.Object
org.apache.sling.commons.osgi.BundleFileProcessor
org.apache.sling.commons.osgi.BSNRenamer
public class BSNRenamer extends BundleFileProcessor
Processes a bundle file by changing its Bundle-SymbolicName. The original BSN is copied to a an X_ORIG_BSN header, to allow users to find out what happened.
Since:
2.4
